// R-TYPE 
00000000100000110111001010110011 "and"
00000010000000000100001010110011 "div"
00000000100000111000001010110011 "add"
00000000000000000110001010110011 "or"
00000010000000000110001010110011 "rem"

// I-TYPE
11111100111000001000011110010011 "addi"
00000000100000010010011110000011 "lw" 
00000000010100001001000100010011 "slli"

// S-TYPE 
00000000011100001000110000100011 "sh"
00000000011100001010010000100011 "sw"

// B-TYPE
00000000101010011000100001100011 "beq"
00000000101010011001100001100011 "bne"
00000000101010011101100001100011 "bge"

// U-TYPE
00000000000000000011010100110111 "lui"
00000000000000000111010100010111 "auipc"

// J-TYPE
00000000000000000011000001101111 "jal"

SUB x1, x2, x3	01000000001100010000000010110011
0100000 00011 00010 000 00001 0110011
DIV x4, x5, x6	00000010011000101100010000110011
0000001 00110 00101 100 01000 0110011
FSUB.S f4, f5, f6	00001000011000101000010001010011
0000100 00110 00101 000 01000 1010011
SW x7, 16(x8)	00000010011101000010000000100011
0000000 01110 10000 001 01000 0100011
